Actions.Name: Tactician's Advance
Actions.Description: Up to two allies anywhere on the battlefield may dash 2.

Actions.Name: Ultimate Weakness
Actions.Description: The Legatus marks a foe in range 8.
Actions.Mark: While marked, the foe is branded+, cannot benefit from cover, stealth, or evasion, and every attack against the target becomes a critical hit on hit (+[D]). The mark lasts until the character is defeated, if bloodied, or becomes bloodied if not.
